ZSCS2016C_CONSTRUCTOR_TOOLTIP: Create a new ZSCS2016C color sensor instance
ZSCS2016C_ENABLE_TOOLTIP: Enable the color sensor and start measurements
ZSCS2016C_READ_CHANNEL_TOOLTIP: Read calibrated value (0-1) of the selected color channel
ZSCS2016C_READ_RGB_TOOLTIP: Read calibrated RGB values as an array [R, G, B] (0-1)
ZSCS2016C_RUN_CALIBRATION_TOOLTIP: Run the calibration procedure (place sensor on white, then black surface)
ZSCS2016C_SAVE_CALIBRATION_TOOLTIP: Save the current calibration data to persistent storage
ZSCS2016C_LOAD_CALIBRATION_TOOLTIP: Load calibration data from persistent storage
